text: Jambusar assembly constituency (જંબુસર વિધાનસભા બેઠક) is one of the 182 assembly constituencies of Gujarat. It is located in Bharuch district. ==List of segments== This assembly seat represents the following segments, # Jambusar Taluka # Amod Taluka ==Total Number of Voters== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/PCAC.pdf {| class="wikitable" |- ! Election !! Polling Stations !! Male Voters !! Female Voters !! Others !! Total Voters |- | 2014 || 358 || 125950 || 117493 || 0 || 243343 |} ==Member of Legislative Assembly== *2007 - Kirankumar Makwana, Indian National Congress *2012 - Chhatrasinh Mori, Bharatiya Janata Party *2017 - Sanjaybhai Solanki Indian National Congress ==Election results== ===2012=== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/Detail_Report_AC2012.pdf ==References== ==See also== List of constituencies of Gujarat Legislative Assembly Gujarat Legislative Assembly Category:Assembly constituencies of Gujarat Category:Bharuch district
title: Jambusar (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
